product_name: Smith Dover ChromaPop Polarchromic Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: An essential piece of gear for active adventurers, the Smith Dover ChromaPop Polarchromic Sunglasses deliver superb coverage and clarity, with protective lens coatings to eliminate glare.
